attributes.action: close the gates to any more foreign imigrants looking to enter our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop the distruction of our economy now and stop foreign workers coming into our country, taking our jobs for less money and then sending all their money back home to their families to get rich on and increase their own countries economy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "close the gates to any more foreign imigrants looking to enter our country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20403


Prime Minister's Office
